name: HENTAI HORROR: The Eight Pictures
description:
HENTAI HORROR: The Eight Pictures

Is a short first-person survival horror game. Your goal is to find eight pictures of anime girls and do not get caught by the Hentai Monster.




You've left alone. No one around. No one to come for help. Test yourself in this unltimately horrific batttle with the Hentai Monster and find out how far are you willing to go for your prize..

Be the first one, who'll be brave enough to fight with the Hentai monster - add the game to your STEAM WISHLIST! The game will cost only 0.99$ with 40% OFF (0.59$) in the first week of the release.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1168170/HENTAI_HORROR_The_Eight_Pictures/
